select * from ygo_card left join ygo_card_name on ygo_card.name=ygo_card_name.name where ygo_card.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
union select * from ygo_card_extra left join ygo_card_name on ygo_card_extra.name=ygo_card_name.name where ygo_card_extra.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
union select * from ygo_card_new left join ygo_card_name on ygo_card_new.name=ygo_card_name.name where ygo_card_new.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT * FROM ygo_card AS t1 left join ygo_card_name on t1.name=ygo_card_name.name JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(RAND()*((SELECT MAX(id) FROM ygo_card)-(SELECT MIN(id) FROM ygo_card))+(SELECT MIN(id) FROM ygo_card)) AS id)AS t2 WHERE t1.id>=t2.id ORDER BY t1.id LIMIT 1;

select * from ygo_card_name left join ygo_card on ygo_card.name=ygo_card_name.name left join ygo_card_extra on ygo_card_extra.name=ygo_card_name.name left join ygo_card_new on ygo_card_new.name=ygo_card_name.name where ygo_card_name.en_name like concat('%',#{enName},'%')
